Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red  Line trains are running with delays near Sheridan due to unauthorized person on the tracks

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red  Line trains are running with delays near Sheridan due to unauthorized person on the tracks

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
